channel.title: How come after i did all the autospawn,command,npcdrop,and made item untradable
channel.description:
the monster wont drop somebody plz tell emw what t do here is the npc id and drop i want if u can make something im missing or something
npcdrop = 1591 1 3101 1

item.title: How come after i did all the autospawn,command,npcdrop,and made item untradable
item.dc:creator: @LeScape_Pk LeScape Pk
item.description:
@LeScape_Pk wrote:

to spawn a damned item…open up NPHandler.java and search for this

f(npcs[NPCID].npcType ==

it should look SOMETHING like this

if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 1625 || npcs[NPCID].npcType == 1604) {
ItemHandler.addItem(Item.randomSlayeritem75(), npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false);
}

now, under the last } add this

if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == NPC#) {
ItemHandler.addItem(ITEM#, npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false);
}

NPC# is the id of the npc you want to drop the item
ITEM# is the id of the item you want to be dropped

Read full topic
item.source: How come after i did all the autospawn,command,npcdrop,and made item untradable
